Text.Page:
Nice thing about cultists? Not good at thinking for themselves! Keep doing whatever they're doing 'til someone stops 'em.

Oh, don't give me that look. This'll be cub's play for you! {@LinkCreature:17#305#Heavens Fall dervishes} are the cult's pride and joy. Kill them, and the rest just stand there with those barrels over their heads and look stupid. Well, stupider.

Helpful tip? Easier to keep count if you take those amulets they all wear. I have fifty myself!

Excellent! You've now learned Puran's Second Maxim: Kill officers to kill momentum.

What a day! You've learned two lessons in soldiering and it seems I'm done with all my work for the week! I suggest we take a break. Nature knows we've both earned one!

You're all right, soldier.

Dervishes? Crazy-looking women with horns and swords and no sense of humor?

Go! Kill!
